function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low productivity and job losses due to public health measures","Impact":"Reduced economic output, decreased investment, and job losses","Mitigation":"Implement flexible work arrangements, remote work solutions, and financial support for affected workers","Technologies":"Remote work technology, virtual collaboration tools, and digital payment platforms","People":"Workers, businesses, and investors","Owner":"Government, industry leaders, and employers"},{"Description":"Decreased output of construction industry due to withdrawal of government intervention","Impact":"Negative impact on construction industry output","Mitigation":"Develop industry-specific standard working procedures in collaboration with Health and Safety Executive (HSE)","Technologies":"Industry-specific guidelines and procedures, health and safety protocols, and monitoring technologies","People":"Construction industry workers and stakeholders","Owner":"Industry leaders, Health and Safety Executive, and government"}]}
